ne7:1.5: Ajjhosanalakkhana tanha, tassa piyarupam satarupam padatthanam.
ne7:1.7: Vannasanthanabyanjanaggahanalakkhana subhasanna, tassa indriya samvaro padatthanam.
ne7:1.9: Sankhatalakkhananam dhammanam asamanupassanalakkhana niccasanna, tassa vinnanam padatthanam.
ne7:1.11: Sabbadhammasampativedhalakkhana vijja, tassa sabbam neyyam padatthanam.
ne7:1.13: Icchavacarapatisamharanalakkhano alobho, tassa adinnadana veramani padatthanam.
ne7:1.14: Abyapajjalakkhano adoso, tassa panatipata veramani padatthanam.
ne7:1.18: Sankhatalakkhananam dhammanam samanupassanalakkhana aniccasanna, tassa uppadavaya padatthanam.
ne7:2.1: Panca kamaguna kamaragassa padatthanam, pancindriyani rupini ruparagassa padatthanam, chatthayatanam bhavaragassa padatthanam, nibbattabhavanupassita pancannam upadanakkhandhanam padatthanam, pubbenivasanussatinanadassanassa padatthanam.
ne7:2.2: Okappanalakkhana saddha adhimuttipaccupatthana ca, anavilalakkhano pasado sampasidanapaccupatthano ca.
ne7:3.1: Aparo nayo, assadamanasikaralakkhano ayonisomanasikaro, tassa avijja padatthanam.
ne7:3.20: Imani bhavangani yada samaggani nibbattani bhavanti so bhavo, tam samsarassa padatthanam.
ne7:4.1: Titthannuta pitannutaya padatthanam, pitannuta pattannutaya padatthanam, pattannuta attannutaya padatthanam, attannuta pubbekatapunnataya padatthanam, pubbekatapunnata patirupadesavasassa padatthanam, patirupadesavaso sappurisupanissayassa padatthanam, sappurisupanissayo attasammapanidhanassa padatthanam, attasammapanidhanam silanam padatthanam, silani avippatisarassa padatthanam, avippatisaro pamojjassa padatthanam, pamojjam pitiya padatthanam, piti passaddhiya padatthanam, passaddhi sukhassa padatthanam, sukham samadhissa padatthanam, samadhi yathabhutananadassanassa padatthanam, yathabhutananadassanam nibbidaya padatthanam, nibbida viragassa padatthanam, virago vimuttiya padatthanam.
ne7:4.3: Evam yo koci upanissayo yo koci paccayo, sabbo so padatthanam.
